note.p: MS found with a specimen of Isotoma axillaris (MEL 2261319). MS annotation by M: 'Answ 14/4/90 F.v.M.' Letter not found.

div.p: Baron F. Von Mueller F.R.S. etc
If you could kindly let me know the name of the enclosed plant which I found growing on a hill near Bowral also of the small fern from Katoomba

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
